content: Sit back and have your mind blown by the manic madness of this Kabukicho-themed dinner show
Enjoy a few drinks or a tasty light meal like “Samurai Sushi” or the cut steak bento
An incredible experience to leave you asking “What did I just watch?”
Book with Rakuten Travel Experiences to get 11% off the door price!
Marvel at the dizzying venue that sparkles from top to bottom with glitz and glam everywhere you turn
